text: Kurt Aßmann (13 July 1883--26 July 1962) was a German admiral. In World War I he commanded the "Torpedoboat Flotilla Flanders". In World War II he was head of naval archives until his retirement in June 1943. == References == == Literature == * Category:1883 births Category:1962 deaths Category:Vice admirals of the Kriegsmarine
title: Kurt Aßmann
